Html:
Hi mark,
I have a problem on a project.I want to only Increase low bit section.I use Threshold, attack time,Release Time,ratio.I change low bit section using this four compressor value. If this possible please help me.!!

you need a dynamic range compression algorithm. NAudio does include a class called SimpleCompressor, but you'd need to wrap that into an ISampleProvider yourself to include it more easily in a signal chain. This is something I hope to do in a future version of NAudio.
